alert.note: Alert for Grande Ronde Valley; Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 6:47PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Union County through 730 PM PDT... At 647 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Minam, or 26 miles northeast of La Grande, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elgin, Imbler and Summerville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Grande Ronde Valley; Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon
